entry.title: Sunday: A few flurries. High plus 1.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this morning then mainly cloudy. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 9 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Fog patches developing near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 12 February 2023
